message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,700,000. It's a great deal considering the value it holds. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I really like the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. However, $1,200,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $1,400,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,300,000. I really think this is a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I see you're serious about acquiring this product. I'm willing to go down to $1,350,000. This is a very fair price considering the value it brings to your business.  I'm open to discussing this further, but this is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,350,000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you at $1,250,000. I think this is a price that works for both of us and allows me to make a good profit on the product.
